common

Class MetadataContext<T extends MetadataStrategy<?>>

  • java.lang.Object
    • common.MetadataContext<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - the type of MetadataStrategy this context encapsulates

    public class MetadataContext<T extends MetadataStrategy<?>>
extends java.lang.Object
    A context class that acts as a wrapper for a MetadataStrategy, providing a simplified interface for clients to interact with various types of metadata. It decouples the client from the specific implementation of the metadata strategy, promoting flexibility and re-usability.

    This class uses generics to ensure type safety while allowing for different concrete strategies, for example: ExifMetadata, PngMetadata) to be used interchangeably.

      private T strategy

      Constructor Description
      MetadataContext(T strategy)
      Constructs a new MetadataContext with the specified strategy.

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      boolean containsMetadata()
      Checks if the encapsulated strategy contains any metadata.
      java.util.Optional<PngDirectory> getDirectory(ChunkType.Category category)
      Returns a specific PngDirectory wrapped in an Optional if the encapsulated strategy is a PngStrategy and the directory is found.
      java.util.Optional<DirectoryIFD> getDirectory(DirectoryIdentifier key)
      Returns a specific DirectoryIFD wrapped in an Optional if the encapsulated strategy is an ExifStrategy and the directory is found.
      java.util.Optional<PngDirectory> getDirectory(Taggable tag)
      Returns a specific PngDirectory wrapped in an Optional if the encapsulated strategy is a PngStrategy and the directory is found using a Taggable key.
      java.util.Iterator<DirectoryIFD> getExifIterator()
      Returns a type-safe iterator for DirectoryIFD instances if the encapsulated strategy is an ExifStrategy.
      java.util.Iterator<PngDirectory> getPngIterator()
      Returns a type-safe iterator for PngDirectory instances if the encapsulated strategy is a PngStrategy.
      boolean hasExifData()
      Checks if the encapsulated strategy contains EXIF metadata.
      boolean hasTextualData()
      Checks if the encapsulated strategy contains textual metadata.
      java.util.Iterator<?> iterator()
      Returns a generic iterator over the directories contained within the encapsulated strategy.
      boolean metadataIsEmpty()
      Checks if the encapsulated strategy's metadata is empty.
      java.lang.String toString()
      Generates a string representation of all metadata entries by iterating through the encapsulated strategy's directories.

    • Method Detail

      • containsMetadata

        public boolean containsMetadata()
        Checks if the encapsulated strategy contains any metadata.
        Returns:
        true if metadata is present, otherwise false

      • metadataIsEmpty

        public boolean metadataIsEmpty()
        Checks if the encapsulated strategy's metadata is empty.
        Returns:
        true if the metadata collection is empty, otherwise false

      • hasExifData

        public boolean hasExifData()
        Checks if the encapsulated strategy contains EXIF metadata.

        This method performs a check based on the specific type of strategy held by the context.

        Returns:
        true if the strategy has EXIF data, otherwise false

      • hasTextualData

        public boolean hasTextualData()
        Checks if the encapsulated strategy contains textual metadata.

        This check is specific to PngStrategy as other types may not support textual data.

        Returns:
        true if the strategy has textual data, otherwise false

      • getExifIterator

        public java.util.Iterator<DirectoryIFD> getExifIterator()
        Returns a type-safe iterator for DirectoryIFD instances if the encapsulated strategy is an ExifStrategy.
        Returns:
        an iterator of DirectoryIFD instances, otherwise an empty iterator

      • getPngIterator

        public java.util.Iterator<PngDirectory> getPngIterator()
        Returns a type-safe iterator for PngDirectory instances if the encapsulated strategy is a PngStrategy.
        Returns:
        an iterator of PngDirectory instances, otherwise an empty iterator

        Returns:
        an Optional containing the DirectoryIFD if found, otherwise, an empty Optional
